bibdata.title: American National Standard guide for construction of open area test sites for performing radiated emission measurements
American National Standard guide for construction of open area test sites for performing radiated emission measurements

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Provides information that is useful in the construction of an open area test site (OATS) used to perform radiated emission measurements in the frequency range 30-1000 MHz. The key recommendations for site selection, ground plane, instrumentation and equipment under test (EUT) services, and all-weather covers are described.<>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
